mapper.select: SELECT tur.user_review_seq userReviewSeq , tur.send_team_member_seq sendMemberSeq , tur.receive_team_member_seq receiveMemberSeq , tur.team_member_review_star reviewStar , tur.team_member_review_content reviewContent , tur.reg_date regDate , tur.mod_date modDate , t.team_name teamName , p.project_title projectTitle FROM tbl_user_review tur JOIN tbl_team_member tm ON (tur.send_team_member_seq = tm.team_member_seq) JOIN tbl_team t ON (tm.team_seq = t.team_seq) JOIN tbl_project p ON (t.project_seq = p.project_seq) WHERE tur.receive_team_member_seq = #{userSeq}
